file_content.text: With the Imperials out of the way, we can start shipping supplies to our outposts again.
I took out those Imperials and recovered your supplies.
Nice work. Wish we had a few more of you Jedi types here on Balmorra to help us out.
Much appreciated. It's good to know the Republic has our back again.
I have to admit, I wasn't sure about you. Seemed a little shifty--no offense. But you came through when it counted.
Imperials = gone // Supply routes = open // E5-D5 = ready for action
Don't worry, little fella. We'll get the supply trains rolling again soon enough.
Thanks for your help. The resistance is in your debt.
Let me know when you've taken out those Imperials and recovered our supplies.
Sheed = not there // Sheed = doesn't understand // Sheed = doesn't care
You know I care! But there's nothing I can do.
E5-D5 = located Imperials // Sheed = assemble team // Team = go after Imperials
We need more than a location. We need troops. I don't have anyone to send!
Sheed = not trying hard enough // E5-D5 = find someone else to help
Your droid seems upset.
Imperials hit one of our supply trains.
Can I be of assistance?
Right now, we need all the help we can get. Imperials hit one of our supply trains.
Are you going to let this bucket-of-bolts talk to you like that?
Droids need to show respect!
I know he's not mad at me. It's those Imperial scum. Hit one of our supply trains.
E5-D5 = only survivor // Imperials = took supplies // E5-D5 = tracked Imperials
We know where they're at, but I can't spare anyone to go after them. The resistance is running thin on good people.
Those Imperials are no match for a Jedi.
Leave this to me.
You're probably right about that. Good to know you're on our side.
The Jedi Order won't turn its back on you.
You're not in this alone.
The Republic is here to support the resistance. Just tell us what you need.
Havoc has plenty to spare.
Folks in the resistance have gotten used to being left high and dry by your kind. Nice to know you're here for us this time.
Every time someone says there's nobody available, seems like they expect me to step up.
Is that a hint?
Sheed = too proud // Sheed = ask nice man for help
Sheed = too proud // Sheed = ask nice lady for help
The droid's right. We're desperate. If you help us out with this, I'll make sure it's worth your while.
You could hire me.
The resistance needs those supplies back. If you can recover some of them, I'll make sure you get a fair cut.
I won't send anyone else out until I know the supply route is safe. We can't afford the losses.
Report back to me after you take out the Imperial patrol so I know the road is clear.
I don't care. [Refuse quest]
We'll figure something out on our own. We always do.
Don't really feel like talking right now.
